com.hydro4ge.raphaelgwt.client
Class RaphaelJS

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.hydro4ge.raphaelgwt.client.RaphaelJS

public class RaphaelJS
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

Overlay class for GWT to use raphaeljs library

Returns:

rect

public final com.hydro4ge.raphaelgwt.client.RaphaelJS.Element rect(double x,
                                                                   double y,
                                                                   double width,
                                                                   double height,
                                                                   double r)
Draw a rectangle (with rounded corners) to the Raphael canvas

Parameters:
x - number x coordinate of top left corner
y - number y coordinate of top left corner
width - width of the rectangle
height - height of the rectangle
r - r number [optional] radius for rounded corners, default is 0
Returns:
the rectangle object with rounded corners
